FINANCE COMMITTEE
COMMITTEE MEETING
~ FINAL ACTIONS ~
Wednesday, February 28, 2024

3:00 PM

Sullivan Chamber

The Finance Committee will have a public meeting to review and discuss the Operating Budget in
advance of the FY25 budget season including a discussion of budget obligations and future
spending planning and to discuss City Council budget priorities and goals.
